title: Battle For The CMA: Eddie vs. Morgan1 + Lunchbox’s Privacy Drama With A Waiter + An Interview With Eric Church’s Long Lost Brother ‘Derrick Church’
itunes:title: Battle For The CMA: Eddie vs. Morgan1 + Lunchbox’s Privacy Drama With A Waiter + An Interview With Eric Church’s Long Lost Brother ‘Derrick Church’
description:
The highly anticipated Battle for the CMA goes down! Eddie Vs. Morgan1 in an Olympic style competition. Eddie promised Morgan1 his CMA trophy if we won this year….and then backed down on his word. So they battle it out and winner takes the award. Lunchbox had a stranger encounter with a waiter from one of his favorite restaurants that came up and told him something at the grocery store. Plus we talk to ‘Derrick Church’ about his brother Eric Church about the CMA’s next week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
